mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from interest_tbl where m_no=#{m_no} and p_no=#{p_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM INTEREST_TBL WHERE M_NO=#{m_no} AND P_NO=#{p_no}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, (SELECT B.UPLOADPATH || '\' || B.UUID || '_' || B.FILENAME FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE B WHERE A.P_NO = B.P_NO AND ROWNUM =1) AS img_url FROM PRODUCT A WHERE P_NO = (SELECT P_NO FROM INTEREST_TBL WHERE M_NO=#{m_no})
